title: How have Christian (or other theist) philosophers and theologians responded to Nietzsche's critique of Christianity? - Quora

response.answer_text: When I think of Friedrich Nietzsche, I think of his ideas and not his person. I think of his basic assumptions of ‘naturalism’, ‘his association with nihilism’ and his ‘atheistic existentialism’ which are assumptions and associations in his theory of value (ethics) which in my view definitely need to be challenged from a Christian perspective.
